simumatch.common

Enum Operator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Operator>
      • simumatch.common.Operator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Operator>

    public enum Operator
extends java.lang.Enum<Operator>
    An operator used to calculate bonuses in Effects.

      • scale

        public abstract double scale(double bonus,
           int times)
        Applies this operator times times over bonus.
        Parameters:
        bonus - Value to be scaled
        times - Number of times the operator is applied
        Returns:
        The scaled value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is negative

      • apply

        public int apply(int a,
        double b)
        Applies this operator to the given operands.

        This version of this method takes an int and a double and returns an int to accommodate to specific use cases that turn out to be common. Note that this method just performs a call to apply(double, double) and rounds the result.

        Parameters:
        a - First operand
        b - Second operand
        Returns:
        Result of the operation
